thread.title: Sanders focuses on gun violence, immigration as 13,000 attend Arizona rally
thread.title_full: Sanders focuses on gun violence, immigration as 13,000 attend Arizona rally - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Sanders focuses on gun violence, immigration as 13,000 attend Arizona rally
text: TUCSON, Ariz. — Presidential hopeful Bernie Sanders made a pair of spirited pitches here Friday night to address continuing gun violence and pass comprehensive immigration reform during a boisterous rally that drew an estimated 13,000 people to a city park. In a departure from his usual stump speech, which focuses heavily on economic inequality, the […] ...
